ongethit_buffs.name: What doesn't kill you makes you stronger.
ongethit_buffs.description: Getting hit gives you a small temporary improvement which stacks.

onblock_buffs.name: Defending the Weak
onblock_buffs.description: Every successful block increases your defense temporarily for a short amount of time.

onpause_buffs.name: Castle
onpause_buffs.description: You fortify your defenses while reducing your offensive capabilities in order to recover.

oncrit_buffs.name: 狂暴者
oncrit_buffs.description:
致命一击会让你陷入疯狂！

大速度、伤害和护甲加成，3回合小精度惩罚。

oncrit_buffs.name: 人工肌肉纤维
oncrit_buffs.description: 每一次暴击都会给你一个小的临时提升，可以叠加。

onmiss_buffs.name: You Fight Like A Dairy Farmer
onmiss_buffs.description: You fight like a dairy farmer!

name: 残暴打击
description: 击晕 1 回合，击退 1 格，仅暴击

messages: 你弓步突进，对准剑尖，刺向%s
